name: InnerGeniusWordoftheDay-Mason
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
We all have different ways of communicating. If you have a Mason in your life, sprinkle these words into your conversations with them and they will feel like you are talking their language.
Unlock your Inner Genius now.
